review: The doctor was really patient. He took the time to ensure I was comfortable all through the procedure. Also for a procedure that I had expected to be painful, he made it quite painless.

The doc was very professional and made the extraction a cake walk. I was so scared but didnt even come to know of it when it was done. He kept on checking with me if I was okay and was explaining the stages of the process. 

Jaspreet Bajwa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I was surprised with the quick removal of my tooth. It was not at all painful, and very very quick.
